value: A Child Met a Chick
A child met a chick going to church.
The chick was eating lunch on the bench.
The child picking a cherry from a branch said "hello" to the chick.
A child met a chick in March.
The chick was sitting on the bench.
The child picking a chili from a branch said "hello" to the chick.
A Shark and A Fish
A shark made a wish at a shop.
I Wish for cash,
I Wish for a dish
A fish made a wish at a shop.
I Wish for cash,
I Wish for a brush
Hearing thunder
This is the way I read a thin book hearing music.
This is the way I brush my teeth hearing music.
This is the way I walk on the path hearing music.
This is the way I read a thick book hearing thunder.
This is the way I study math hearing thunder.
This is the way I use a toothbrush hearing thunder.
Who\'s this?
Who\'s this?
She\'s my mother.
Who\'s that?
He\'s my father.
Who\'s there?
I am your brother.
What a happy happy family.
What are those?
They are my board games.
What are these?
They are my dolls.
What are they?
They are my blocks.
Let\'s play with them together.
A Whale and A Boy
Where do you live, whale?
I live in the sea.
What color is your belly?
I have a white belly.
Do you have whiskers?
Why are you on the wheelchair?
I broke my legs yesterday.
When do you whistle?
I whistle when I feel happy.
What are you eating?
I am eating wheat bread.
King & Angel
There was a young king with a ring.
He loved the angel with wings so much.
He gave her the ring, singing a love song.
The angel was so happy.
There was the young king on the swing.
The angel said, \"Let\'s play ping pong.\"
The King said, \"OK. Let\'s play ping pong.\"
They played ping pong all day long.
Oink. Oink. What a smell!
A pink pig passing by the skunk said, Oink. Oink. What a smell!
The pig driving by the tank tooted.
Honk. Honk. Watch out!
The pig eating much junk food said, I have much junk food in the trunk.
The pig saw a cat in the kitchen sink, and gave her a wink.
Good Boy
A boy brought a pot to his mom.
His mom boiled oysters in the pot.
He brought oil to his mom.
His mom fried oysters with the oil.
He put coins into piggy bank.
His mom said, Good boy. with joy.
Clown & Magician
A clown can let a mouse jump on a cow.
The clown can let the cow dance with a towel.
What a wonderful clown!
He practices circus everyday in the house.
A magician can let a sprout turn into a flower.
The magician can let bubbles turn into a cloud.
What a wonderful magician!
He practices magic everyday in town.
I can make
I can make a train with clay.
I can make a tail with clay.
I can make a tray with clay.
I can spray paint on them and play with them.
I can make a nail with clay,
I can make a snail with clay.
I can make a chain with clay.
I can spray paint on them and play with them.
Cheese and Peaches
I like to eat cheese and peaches.
I like to eat meat and green juice.
I like to eat green peas soup.
I like to eat them under the tree.
I like to wear jeans and a T-shirt.
I like to sleep wearing green pajamas.
I like to see movie sitting in the backseat.
I like to enjoy myself.
The best cook
The best cook reads a cook book.
The best cook uses a magic spoon.
The best cook cooks with a fire wood.
He serves the best food.
The best builder uses a magic tool.
The best builder makes a good roof.
The best builder wears the special boots.
He even works under the moon.
The goat and the toad
It snowed and cold wind blew.
A goat made a coat with a bow for a toad.
The toad said, Thank you. and went home blowing a whistle.
It was sunny and warm wind blew.
The toad baked a loaf of bread.
The toad gave it to the goat mowing the lawn.
The goat and the toad are best friends.
The sky is blue
It\'s Tuesday, today. The sky is blue.
I am going on a trip with my family.
I am going to drink fruit juice on the cruise.
I am going to swim in a swimsuit.
It\'s Friday, today. The sky is blue.
I have an art class.
I am going to make a suit with a tissue.
I am going to use glue and scissors.
I\'ll turn on the faucet
I\'ll turn on the faucet to take a shower.
It\'s a hot day in August.
Hawks are sleeping in a straw house to cool down in hot weather.
I\'ll sleep there with the hawks tonight.
Leaves are falling without a pause.
It\'s a cool day in autumn.
A fawn is dancing on the fallen leaves holding a red leaf.
I\'ll dance with the fawn paw in hand.
Don\'t cry.
Everything is fine.
We have yummy pie.
The fairies are flying high to catch a ribbon in the sky.
Everything is perfect.
Camping in July is a lot of fun.
We can sleep all day long on the hammock tied to tree.
Don\'t fight. Everything is alright.
We should follow the rules when we play board games.
If I were a guitarist
If I were a guitarist, I would play the guitar.
I would play the guitar in the bar near the farm.
I would play the guitar under the stars at night.
If I were an artist, I would draw a car.
I would draw a car on the big glass jar.
I would draw a car with oil paint and markers.
If I were a cook, I would make garlic sauce.
I would make garlic sauce for garlic chicken and garlic pizza.
I would make garlic sauce for garlic butter steak.
One strong man
One strong man was born by the seashore.
He was strong enough to lift his horse.
He could play well in sports.
He snored very loudly while sleeping.
One day a visitor from the north came to him.
But he was worried because he was short of food.
The visitor gave him corns and he cooked them with a torch.
What an effort!
Tiger and Turtle
One tiger and a turtle ran a race.
A bird said, The tiger is faster than the turtle.
But germs in the fur made the tiger sick.
So the turtle won first place at the race.
The tiger wore a shirt to race again.
A spider said, The tiger will win the race.
But the wind blew, he got dirt in his eyes.
So the turtle won first place at the race again.
